section.heading: County laboratories; boards of managers; officers; meetings; compensation and expenses

content.p:
ยง 524. County laboratories; boards of managers; officers; meetings;
compensation and expenses. 1. Except in counties wherein the laboratory
functions as a division of the county health department or wherein the
board of managers has been abolished, the board of managers of each
laboratory shall elect a chairman, vice chairman and a secretary.
 2. The board of managers of each laboratory shall hold a meeting at
least four times in each year, and at such other times as it may deem
necessary.
 3. Each member of the board of managers attending meetings of such
board shall receive his actual and necessary expenses incident thereto,
to be audited and paid in the same manner as other expenses of the
laboratory.
 4. Nothing contained in this section shall be construed to effect any
change in the administration and organization of a county board of
health which shall be vested with the powers and duties of a board of
managers pursuant to subdivision five of section five hundred
twenty-three of this chapter.
